Articles.Content:
Heyo guys. I know this is not striclty KSP related but I wanted to share with you a project I'm sure you will enjoy, since it's rocket-science related.

I'm a CG student and had to model, render and do post production work on some ruins. I chose to make a launchpad, after seing some pictures of old structures from the Kosmodrome in Kazakhstan.

I hope you enjoy other things might follow.
A most professional job! Plants are a little sparse, but other than that it is top-notch.

A most professional job! Plants are a little sparse, but other than that it is top-notch.

Yeah I could've done better with the grass, but school project means I was limited in time, but I might rework on it a bit later
